MsgJp: エリアミッション《力に呑まれし王者》を攻略せよ！
MsgEn:
Clear Area Mission "The Ruler Overwhelmed by
Power"!

MsgJp: エピタフロード《英霊眠りし道 メガドシスの記憶》を攻略せよ！
MsgEn:
Clear the Epitaph Road "Heroic Spirit Sleeping
Path: Memory of Megadosys"!

MsgJp: サブストーリー《暗部を暴きし暗躍者》を支援せよ！
MsgEn:
Support Substory "Expose the Dark Side to the One
Operating behind the Scenes"!

MsgJp: ウォーミッション《霧の森の死闘》を攻略せよ！
MsgEn:
Clear War Mission "The Deathly Battle of the
Forest of Mist"!

MsgJp: エリアミッション《彼方より堕ち呼ばれし魔道》を攻略せよ！
MsgEn:
Clear Area Mission "Magick Called to the Deepest
Depths"!

MsgJp: エピタフロード《英霊眠りし道 ウルテカの記憶》を攻略せよ！
MsgEn:
Clear the Epitaph Road "Heroic Spirit Sleeping
Path: Memory of Urteca"!

MsgJp: ウォーミッション《蘇りし絶望の炎》を攻略せよ！
MsgEn:
Clear War Mission "Resurrection of the Flame of
Despair"!

MsgJp: "筆跡が新しい日記のページが落ちている"
MsgEn:
"The handwriting is from a page that has fallen
out of a new diary."

MsgJp:
これほどに醜く、滑稽な姿の魔物は見た事が無い
変な話だが――自分があの魔物として
生まれなかった事に、感謝を覚えてすらいる
MsgEn:
It's strange that I have never previously seen
demons of such an ugly,
comical figure like this...I should remember to
be thankful, to have not been born into
this world as one of those demons.

MsgJp:
戦いを重ねるごとに、憎めなく思えてきたが――
愛着が湧く前に、希少素材が入手できて良かった
MsgEn:
Whenever I had fought a battle, my mind was clear
of hatred...
It was good that rare materials made themselves
available before I got too
hot-headed.

MsgJp:
さらに、戦いの中でこの地の魔物が
使っていた武器を入手する事もできた
故郷で流通していた物よりも
高度に鍛えられている
MsgEn:
In addition, by battling the demon that laid
claim to
this place, I was able to get the weapon I had
been using forged to a
higher quality than those circulating around my
hometown.

MsgJp:
新たに訪れたこの地で、まだまだ知らない事は多い
素材だけでなく、多くの知識も
持ち帰る事ができそうだ
MsgEn:
There are many things still unknown to me about
this
new place. Perhaps I may not only bring materials
home, but also a
wealth of knowledge.

MsgJp: 起こるのは良い事ばかり――心配は杞憂だったのだ
MsgEn:
Only good things have occurred...I was needlessly
worried.

MsgJp: “筆跡が新しい日記のページが落ちている”
MsgEn:
"Bad fate"
...Aah, have you been creeping up on me without a
sound?

MsgJp:
数多の魔物を打ち倒し、
実力をつけていく手応えは確かに感じていた――
だからこそ、慢心があったのかもしれない
MsgEn:
I certainly felt the way to put my skills to the
test,
was to defeat a multitude of monsters...
Perhaps I was too overconfident in my ability.

MsgJp:
先の戦いで手負いだとしても、油断があったとしても
こうも簡単に囲まれるとは情けない――
MsgEn:
Even if you purposely throw the previous battle,
and even if you
were unprepared, it is pitiful to be surrounded
as easily as this...

MsgJp:
暗闇の先から、盗賊たちの息遣いが聞こえる
この緊張を破るきっかけがあれば、
飢えた狼のように一斉に飛びかかる気なのだろう
MsgEn:
From the darkness, you can hear the thieves
breathing as
they wait for a chance to break the tension in
the air.
Perhaps they're going to jump out and strike in
unison like starving wolves.

MsgJp:
全てを塔に置いてきたことだけが、唯一の救いだ
あの妖しき宝は、盗賊ごときに渡すのは惜しいからな
MsgEn:
Putting everything into the tower, may prove to
be my salvation.
That bewitching treasure, it would be regrettable
to hand it over to someone such as a thief.

MsgJp:
“良くない運命”
――あぁ、音も無く忍び寄られていたのか
MsgEn:
"Bad fate"
...Aah, have you been creeping up on me without a
sound?

MsgJp: "日記の１ページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page out of a diary has fallen down."

MsgJp:
遺跡の奥底に坐していたあの魔物――
レスタニアに生息しているそれと姿形は似ているけど
より凶暴で、俊敏だったように感じます
MsgEn:
That demon dwelling within the depths of the
ruins...
It looks similar to those that inhabit Lestania,
but feels far more
ferocious and agile.

MsgJp:
それとは別に、見知った魔物も見かけました
同様の進化を遂げたのか、何らかの手段で
向こうからこちらへ渡って来たのか――
MsgEn:
That aside, I also saw a monster I recognized.
Have you evolved in a similar way by some means?
Did you cross over to here from there...?

MsgJp:
しかし、我々の知っていた倒し方が通用したせいか
ベンジャミン様は少し興奮しておられるようでした
MsgEn:
However, it seemed that Benjamin was a bit excited
because the method of killing we knew had worked.

MsgJp:
ベンジャミン様の命でこの日記をつけるように
なってから、心の機微と出来事のつながりが
整理でき、人の感情が推測できるように
なってきた気がします――
MsgEn:
Since I had begun to record Benjamin's life in
this diary,
I feel it is now possible to organize the link
between the subtleties of the mind,
and the events of one's life to better understand
how they feel...

MsgJp:
この調子で、もう少し――
主人の心に寄り添えるポーンになりたいものです
MsgEn:
In this manner, just a little further...
I'll become a pawn that is closer to my master's
heart.

MsgJp: "日記の１ページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page out of a diary has fallen down."

MsgJp:
本当にこのモロー樹林の侵食は、深刻なようです
侵食の治療はなんとか可能であるものの
根本的な原因が何か判明していない以上――
かからないに越したことはありません
MsgEn:
It seems that the corruption of the "Morrow
Forest" has gotten
serious. Although the treatment of corruption is
somehow possible, I do not know
what has initially caused it to form...
It's best that I don't take anything from here.

MsgJp:
今回の探索で、侵食には重度なものになると
より凶暴化し、感染力が上がる事が分かりました
相貌も変化し、正視に耐えられぬ姿になることも――
MsgEn:
During this investigation, I've learned that the
corruption
seems to become more of an issue when it reaches
a severe level. Upon which,
the infectivity increases, and the appearance
changes to form a figure that one
could not bear to look at...

MsgJp:
レスタニアとフィンダムの迷宮を巡り
希少素材を回収する旅も、もう長くなりますが――
MsgEn:
Adventures through the labyrinths of Lestania
and Phindym to collect rare materials, have only
gotten longer...

MsgJp:
ベンジャミン様は集めた素材を
すべて装備品に変え、ご友人が滞在していた地
滞在したであろう地の最奥に
納めていくことを続けておられます
MsgEn:
Master Benjamin gathered all of the materials
collected thus far,
and used them to form equipment here in the land
where your friend had stayed.
In the most remote parts of this place, he
continuously offers up what he has created.

MsgJp:
4部位それぞれで行う――
ということは、残るはあと2ヶ所
真意は分かりかねますが、我々は付き従うのみです
MsgEn:
"Do this in each of the four sites"...
That means there are two sites still remaining.
We may not understand the intention behind this,
but we tag along regardless.

MsgJp: "日記の１ページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page out of a diary has fallen down."

MsgJp:
この大陸は、その気候や生態、文化など
全てにおいて異なる点が多く見られます
MsgEn:
On this continent, the climate, ecology, culture,
and etc,
are all so different than everything we knew.

MsgJp:
特に、この水路で見たあのサルのような魔物――
姿形はレスタニアに生息しているものに
似ていますが、決定的に違うのは、そのトゲ――
MsgEn:
Particularly, monsters like the ape we had seen
in this waterway..
Its appearance is similar to those inhabiting
Lestania,
but decisively different, because of those
thorns...

MsgJp:
しかしこの魔物からも、レスタニアでは見る事の無い
希少な素材を回収できました
これで、水路に降りた目的を達成したはずです
MsgEn:
However, from this demon we were able to recover
one of the rare materials that did not exist in
Lestania.
With this, we should have achieved the purpose of
why we came into this waterway.

MsgJp:
――ベンジャミン様は
ご友人の遺体と日記を発見してから
以前にも増して寡黙になられたようです――
MsgEn:
...Master Benjamin seems to become more withdrawn
the more we stumble upon the diaries of his
acquaintances who have likely
fallen...

MsgJp:
時折、酷く悔しそうな表情をされます――
しかしその真意までは
ポーンの私には判らないのです
MsgEn:
Occasionally, I will have a look of chagrin on my
face...
but the intention behind it, is one that my pawn
can't understand.

MsgJp: "誰かの日記の１ページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page of someone's diary has fallen"

MsgJp:
あの話は本当だったのか――
氷魔がごく稀に落とすという
強力な希少素材――
MsgEn:
Was the story true?
The one about the ice demon that drops a powerful
rare material?

MsgJp:
村の情報屋が言うことには
今までその姿かたちを見た者はいないらしい
MsgEn:
The information broker in the village said that
there has been nobody that has seen the figure
until just now.

MsgJp:
ならばなぜ、情報屋がその存在を知っているのか？
そんな怪しい話、どうせ戯言に違いないと
たかをくくっていたが――
MsgEn:
So pray tell, how does the information broker
know of its existence?
Such a suspicious story, it must be a load of
crap...

MsgJp:
まさか本当に存在していたとはな！
ああ、触れているだけで
手のひらがピリピリと痛むほどの冷気を感じる
どれほどの魔力を秘めているのか――
MsgEn:
It certainly did exist, and must've existed for a
while now!
Oh, just touching it has made a painful tingling
chill linger in my palm.
Just how much magical power is hidden within
it...?

MsgJp:
他にもこういった物が無いか
調べてみる価値はあるな――
MsgEn:
Are there others like this?
It may be worth investigating further...

MsgJp: "誰かの日記の１ページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page of someone's diary has fallen"

MsgJp:
危ない所だった――
ただでさえ怪力で厄介なサイクロプスが
侵食によって、およそ生物とは
思えない力を発揮していた
MsgEn:
It was a dangerous place...
Even a simple Cyclops, already troublesome due to
its sturdiness,
was demonstrating an unexpected strength when
corrupted by these strange
organisms.

MsgJp:
まともに相手をしていたら、今頃命は無かっただろう
今こうして日記を書いている手も、震えが止まらない
MsgEn:
If I did not have a decent partner, I would not
currently be alive.
Even as I write this, my hands cannot stop
trembling.

MsgJp:
なんとか手に入れたこのおぞましい貴重素材――
見た目はひどいものだが、
祈祷師や好事家あたりが見れば大喜びするだろう
MsgEn:
I did manage to acquire this valuable and hideous
material somehow...
Although it's a terrible sight to behold, you
would be delighted to see the prices the
shamans and dilettantes have offered for it.

MsgJp:
しかし、金にするのが本当に正しい用途なのか？
もっと集めることで、何か作り出せるのかもしれない
MsgEn:
But, is this really the right way to use it;
making money?
Perhaps by gathering more, something useful might
be made from it.

MsgJp:
例えば、それが武器だとしたら――
大きな力を持つはずだ
MsgEn:
For example, if formed into a weapon...it should
be imbued with great power.

MsgJp: "誰かの日記の１ページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page of someone's diary has fallen"

MsgJp:
俺も腕には自信があるつもりだが、
正直言って今回はヒヤリとさせられた――
侵食されたグリフィンとは、これほど凶暴なものか
MsgEn:
I am confident in my weapons, but if I am honest,
this time I may have made a mistake...
Is this Infected Griffin as ferocious as they say?

MsgJp:
さすがに今回ばかりは、落命すら覚悟した
まだ命がある事、感謝せねば――
MsgEn:
As one would expect, even though I was prepared
to die,
I still live, and I must not take that for
granted...

MsgJp:
ともあれ、そろそろ収集物も増えてきた――
持ち歩くにも動きづらいため
ひとまとまりにして保管しておくことにしよう
MsgEn:
Anyway, my collection has recently grown in
size...
I've decided to keep it all in one place, as it
is getting hard
to carry it around everywhere with me.

MsgJp:
魔物の巣になるばかりの
うち捨てられた建物があった
村に置き去るよりは、そこの方が安心だろう
MsgEn:
There was an abandoned building nearby.
It would be much more secure to put it there,
than to leave it
in the village, only for it to become some
monster's nest.

MsgJp:
印象的なその姿――
我がアジトを『塔』と名付けよう
MsgEn:
What an impressive figure...
My own secret hideout, I'll call it the "Tower".

MsgJp: "古い日記のページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page from an old diary has fallen down."

MsgJp:
ベヘモットを倒し、宝を入手できたのは良かったが
それを塔まで持ち帰るのに苦労した――
MsgEn:
It was satisfying to beat that behemoth and get
treasure from it,
but I had a hard time bringing it back to the
tower...

MsgJp:
戦いの最中だけでなく、
帰り道にすらアイツに苦労させられるとは――
苦労した分、この素材が何に
使えるのかという期待は高まる一方だ
MsgEn:
Not only during the battles,
but even on the way back to that guy I have
suffered hardships...
Due to these struggles, the expectations I have
for what this
material can be used for are rising.

MsgJp:
ここしばらくの収穫は
我ながら好調すぎるほどだ
日頃の感謝もあり、例の情報屋に話してみたが――
MsgEn:
The harvest here has been great for a while and
I've felt the need to show gratitude because of
it.
For example, I spoke to the information broker...

MsgJp:
青い顔になって、そんなものを集めるのは
すぐ止めるようにと強く言われた
なんでも、“良くない運命”を引き寄せるとか――
嘘をついている表情ではないが――
にわかに信じがたい
MsgEn:
They became pale in the face, and said that
collecting
such things must be stopped at once.
Doing anything else, would be inviting "bad
fate"...
By the look on their face, they weren't lying...
It's still hard to believe though.

MsgJp: 向かう所敵無し、これほどの絶好調だと言うのに――
MsgEn:
I'm unbeatable though, and would say this is
going to go perfectly well...

MsgJp: "筆跡が新しい日記のページが落ちている"
MsgEn:
"The handwriting is from a page that has fallen
out of a new diary."

MsgJp:
見た目は何ともおぞましく
邪悪な魔法は強力だったが
叩き落としてしまえば、たやすいものだった――
MsgEn:
What a horrible sight.
Dark magic worked incredibly well against it,
and when it was knocked down, it was easy to slay
it...

MsgJp:
こんな魔物に、数多の人々が言葉無き姿に
変えられたかと思うと、何ともやるせない
MsgEn:
To think that many people were changed into
speechless statues
by such a demon, is deeply depressing...

MsgJp:
ともあれ、希少素材は入手した
せめてメドゥーサの犠牲となった人々に
安らかな眠りが与えられるよう――祈るしかない
MsgEn:
Anyway, as soon as we collect the rare material
from it,
we have to say a prayer for the souls that have
fell victim at the hands of the Medusa...
I have no choice but to pray...

MsgJp:
この素材に、どれだけの
人間の怨念が込められているか
いや――今まで集めてきた全てが
同じ宿因にあるのだろう
MsgEn:
This material...
Are there remnants of human grudges is trapped
within?
It's unpleasant...but it seems to be used for the
same purpose as
everything else we've collected up until now in
the inn.

MsgJp:
――それを考えれば、集めると
“良くない運命”を引き寄せるという
いつか聞いた話も頷けるように思う
MsgEn:
...Given that, if one collects things like these
they say it will invite a "bad fate".
I think the stories I've heard will someday
become true...

MsgJp: "日記の１ページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page out of a diary has fallen down."

MsgJp:
侵食の進んだ、危険な土地ではありましたが――
退治した大型魔物に侵食の気配は無く
今まで同様強敵だったものの、少し安心しました
MsgEn:
Although the land was highly corrupted and
dangerous -
there was no sign of infestation in the large
demons that we eliminated.
And although they were as powerful as ever, we
were a bit relieved.

MsgJp:
しかし、このような土地で侵食されず生息するとは
移り住んだばかりなのか、抗体があるのか――
MsgEn:
However, to live in a land like this without
being infected...
Is it because they just moved in, or do they have
antibodies?

MsgJp:
ベンジャミン様はその美しい魔物からも素材を
回収すると、装備品をまた一つ作成されました
この装備もまた――塔に納めるおつもりなのでしょう
MsgEn:
Master Benjamin collected materials from that
beautiful demon and created another piece of
equipment.
This equipment also intended to be stored in the
tower.

MsgJp:
先日立ち寄った拠点で耳に入って来たのですが――
フィンダムには、偉大な人物が亡くなった際
装具や装飾品を副葬品として埋葬する文化が
あるそうなのです
MsgEn:
I overheard at a stopover the other day-- that
there is a tradition in Phindym where when great
men die, they are buried with ornaments and
ornaments as burial accessories.

MsgJp:
ベンジャミン様がご友人の足跡を巡りながら
作成した装備品を埋葬していくのは――
フィンダムの流儀に則った弔い、なのかもしれません
MsgEn:
Perhaps Master Benjamin, while tracing the
footsteps of his friend, is burying the equipment
he created—an homage following the Phindym
tradition.

MsgJp: "日記の１ページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page out of a diary has fallen down."

MsgJp:
驚くべき発見です！
ピクシーが、これほど高度な社会的序列を築いて
いたとは――しかも、その強固さは
比較対象にされることの多いゴブリン以上です
MsgEn:
It is a surprising discovery!
I had no idea that Pixies had built such a high
level of social hierarchy - and moreover, its
strength is greater than that of the commonly
compared Goblin.

MsgJp:
ベンジャミン様はいつになくご機嫌が良いようで
なんと――ご自分のことを
少し話してくださいました！
MsgEn:
Mr. Benjamin seemed to be in an unusually good
mood and, by golly--he told us a little about
himself!

MsgJp:
まず、亡きご友人について
フィンダム人唯一の友人であること――
彼の志に敬意を表し、弔いの旅を続けていること――
MsgEn:
First and foremost, I pay my respects to my late
comrade, the only friend of a Phindymian. I
continue my journey in tribute to his aspirations
and in mourning.

MsgJp:
さらに、旅が終わったら二度と
このようなことが起きないよう
冒険者の集いを作り、助け合えるように
したいということ
MsgEn:
Furthermore, once our journey concludes, I wish
to establish a gathering of adventurers to ensure
that such events never happen again, and to foster
mutual assistance.

MsgJp:
そして最も感動したのは、我々にも
その一端を担わせてくださるということ――
ポーンでありながら、仲間として
認められたような気さえしました
MsgEn:
And what moved me the most was that we were
allowed to play a part in it as well. Even as
pawns, it felt like we were recognized as
companions.

MsgJp: "日記の１ページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page out of a diary has fallen down."

MsgJp:
この森の最奥で待ち構えていた魔物は
一度対峙した記憶のある魔物――
その腕力は相変わらず脅威でしたが
危なげなく突破することができました
MsgEn:
The creature that lay in wait at the deepest part
of this forest was a creature I had once faced
before. Its strength remained as formidable as
ever, but we were able to overcome it without much
trouble.

MsgJp:
癒しの力を当てることで
あの奇妙な触手の威力を
一定時間抑えることができるようなのです
MsgEn:
It seems that applying the power of healing can
temporarily suppress the strange tentacles' power.

MsgJp:
ところで――
最近は侵食されている魔物と対峙することが多く
ベンジャミン様はよく咳き込み
どこか苦しそうなご様子です
MsgEn:
By the way -
Recently, Master Benjamin has been facing many
infected enemies, and often coughs with a somewhat
painful appearance.

MsgJp:
覚者は竜の力を得ているとはいえ
病には罹りますし、ごくゆっくりと老衰もする――
一言で申し上げるならば、心配です
MsgEn:
While Arisen possess the power of the dragon,
they can still fall ill, and age gradually as
well. In a word, it is a cause for concern.

MsgJp:
どうも、後ろ向きなことばかり考えてしまいます
「弔い」という目的を果たした時
あの方はどうなってしまわれるのでしょう
最悪の場合を想像してしまう私を、お許しください
MsgEn:
I find myself constantly dwelling on negative
thoughts. When we achieve the "mourning" purpose,
I wonder what will become of that person. Please
forgive me for imagining the worst-case scenario.

MsgJp: "日記の１ページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page out of a diary has fallen down."

MsgJp:
侵食されている魔物の行動には、
いくつかのパターンが見られます
MsgEn:
There are several patterns observed in the
behavior of the infected creatures.

MsgJp:
とにかく凶暴性が助長されるもの
侵食前と変わらない行動サイクルを持つもの
そしてこの魔物のように侵食から逃れようと
もがき苦しむもの――
MsgEn:
There are those whose aggressiveness is
exacerbated, those that maintain the same
behavioral cycle as before infection, and those
like this creature, who struggle in agony, trying
to escape from the corruption.

MsgJp:
その姿は哀れを誘いますが――
侵食によって箍の外れた力は、一瞬でも
気を緩めればこちらが命を落とすほどです
MsgEn:
Their appearance evokes pity, but the power
unleashed by Corruption is so dangerous that even
a momentary lapse in concentration could cost us
our lives.

MsgJp:
この度の魔物は強敵でしたが
それ以上に苦戦しました
ベンジャミン様の動きが鈍く、我々が
それを庇っていたためです
MsgEn:
The creatures we faced this time were formidable
foes, but what made it even more challenging was
that Master Benjamin's movements were slow, and we
were protecting him.

MsgJp:
このままでは、ベンジャミン様のご友人を弔うはずが
我々自身の弔い旅になってしまうかもしれません
帰還し、ゆっくり休養いただけるまであと少し――
MsgEn:
If this continues, our journey to mourn Master
Benjamin's late friend might turn into our own
mourning journey. We'll have to return and rest a
little while longer until Master Benjamin can
recuperate.

MsgJp: "日記の１ページが落ちている"
MsgEn: "A page out of a diary has fallen down."

MsgJp:
最後の戦いは、壮絶を極めました
侵食の悪魔――
相手はまさに、その言葉にふさわしい怪物でした
MsgEn:
The final battle was truly epic. The demon of
infection—our adversary was undoubtedly a monster
befitting those words.

MsgJp:
最後の力を振り絞り、何とか止めを刺したものの――
我々従者は深手を負ってしまったのです
MsgEn:
We mustered our last ounce of strength and
managed to strike the finishing blow, but as a
result, we, the servants, sustained serious
injuries.

MsgJp:
傷つき、動けない我々を残し
ベンジャミン様は一人、行ってしまわれました
目的を達するためには足手まといは不要――
そういうことなのでしょう
MsgEn:
Leaving us wounded and immobilized behind, Master
Benjamin went on alone. To achieve the objective,
we can't have anything slowing us down—perhaps
that was the reason.

MsgJp:
導きを失った私たちは
ただ愚直に、主の帰りを待つことしかできません
最後の魔窟殿へ独りで向かった、傷だらけの主を――
MsgEn:
We, who have lost our guidance, can do nothing
but earnestly await the return of our master. Our
master, who ventured alone to the final demon's
lair, battered and bruised.

MsgJp:
戻られたあの方を暖かく迎えるため
一体何をすべきか、ベンジャミン様と交わした言葉を
思い起こしながら考えてみようと思います
MsgEn:
I will think about what we should do to warmly
welcome them back based on the words exchanged
with Master Benjamin, with the aim of greeting
them upon their return.

MsgJp: “手記と思われる紙の切れ端が落ちている”
MsgEn: "Scraps of a paper note seem to have fallen down."

MsgJp: “塔”とは一体、どこにあるのだろう？
MsgEn: This "Tower" of his, where the heck is it?

MsgJp:
用心深い彼のことだ、たやすく見つかる場所に
あるとは思っていないが――
日記によると、全てをそこに置いてきたのだとか
MsgEn:
He's very cautious, so I don't think he's in a
place
that can be easily found...
According to the diary, he says everything has
been placed there?

MsgJp:
「全て」がすなわち宝を意味するならば
盗賊を警戒して巧妙に隠す意図も理解できる
――物に執着があるとは、少々意外だったが
MsgEn:
If by everyhing he means "treasure",
you can understand his intention to hide it from
any would-be thieves.
...It's still a bit surprising that there is an
obsessed with such
things though.

MsgJp:
とはいえ、彼の足取りを順に追っていけば
いつかは“塔”に辿り着くだろう
MsgEn:
Nevertheless, if we retrace his steps
we will arrive at the tower in due time.

MsgJp:
彼が命尽きる時まで追い求めた宝――
その遺志を継ぎ、形にして納めることで
彼と私、お互いにとって良い弔いになるはずだ
MsgEn:
The treasure that he had chased after until the
time of his death...
By carrying on his will, and shaping it, both he
and I, will have lavish funerals.

MsgJp: “手記と思われる紙の切れ端が落ちている”
MsgEn: "Scraps of a paper note seem to have fallen down."

MsgJp:
魔物を狩り、呪われた宝から
鎧を造りだす時間を除けば
一時も休むことなく進み、彼の痕跡を追っている
MsgEn:
Between hunting demons, and putting aside time to
craft armor from the cursed treasure...
I have no time to take breaks, and must carefully
retrace his steps.

MsgJp:
だが、フィンダムでの無理が祟り
咳は酷くなる一方で、従者どもに心配された
MsgEn:
However, this cursed land of Phindym has given me
an unnatural cough, which has made my pawns
worried.

MsgJp:
いや、正しくは「そう見える」と言うべきか
彼らがまるで人間のような仕草を見せるたび
怖気と虚しさを感じるのだ
MsgEn:
No, I should say they "look like they are".
Everytime they show a gesture or expression like
a human being,
it feels unnerving and empty.

MsgJp:
家族も故郷も失い、救いを求めて心臓を捧げ
得たものがこんな傀儡だったとは――
工作や戦いの腕が優れているとはいえ
当時は愕然としたものだ
MsgEn:
To lose my family and hometown, seeking salvation
and dedicating my heart,
only to receive a puppet such as this...
Although their inherent skill in crafting and
combat are outstanding, at the time,
I was appalled.

MsgJp:
弔いをしてやれるような――
生涯で友と言える相手は、彼くらいだろう
MsgEn:
I'm going to mourn...
The partner that would be known as a friend in
his life, they would not be able to.

MsgJp: “手記と思われる紙の切れ端が落ちている”
MsgEn: "Scraps of a paper note seem to have fallen down."

MsgJp:
従者が時たま、本当に人の心を
持っているのではないかと錯覚するような
表情を見せるようになってきた――
MsgEn: Occasionally, a follower has a truly human heart.

MsgJp:
今までろくに話もしなかったことを後悔しそうだ
身体がひどく弱っているせいで
精神が落ち込みやすくなっているのだろうか
MsgEn:
I'm starting to regret not having spoken much
until now. Could it be that my spirit is easily
downcast because my body is in such a weakened
state?

MsgJp:
心の奥底で、凶暴な衝動が
揺らめくのも感じるのだ
今まで見てきたおぞましい魔物のように
私も変わってしまうのだろうか――
MsgEn:
Deep in my heart, I can feel the flickering of a
violent impulse. Just like the hideous enemies I
have seen before, will I also end up
changing—transforming into something horrifying?

MsgJp:
長く関わりすぎたのだ
大きな力を持つ物は人を強く引きつけるが
それが淀み――侵されていれば、悲劇を呼ぶ
MsgEn:
It is because they possess great power that they
strongly attract people, but if that power
stagnates or is invaded, it will bring tragedy.

MsgJp:
残すは遙かに見える塔のみ
頼もしき従者と共に
どうか、辿り着かせてくれ――竜よ
MsgEn:
All that remains is the tower in the distance.
Please, with my reliable attendants, guide me to
reach it, oh, Dragon.

MsgJp:
斬り崩しの予備動作が短縮され
より素早く剣を振り下ろすことができる
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に予備動作さらに短縮</COL>
MsgEn:
Decreases the charge time of Guard Break,
allowing you to swing the sword more quickly.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases charge time
further.</COL>

MsgJp:
えぐり突き時の攻撃速度が上昇する
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に攻撃速度がより上昇</COL>
MsgEn:
Increases attack speed when using Gouge.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases attack speed
further.</COL>

MsgJp:
盾弾きの発動時に敵の体勢を崩しやすくなる
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に吹き飛ばし力がより増加</COL>
MsgEn:
Increases the stagger power of your shield
counters.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stagger
power.</COL>

MsgJp:
盾弾きの発動時に敵を気絶させやすくなる
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に気絶攻力がより増加</COL>
MsgEn:
Increases the Knockout Power of perfect blocks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Knockout
Power.</COL>

MsgJp:
盾弾きの発動時にスタミナが一定量回復する
<COL ffdc78>LV毎にスタミナ回復量がより増加</COL>
MsgEn:
Relax your blocking, allowing recovery of Stamina
upon performing perfect blocks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Stamina recovery
further.</COL>

MsgJp:
筋力が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に筋力がより増加</COL>
MsgEn:
Increases physical power.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases physical
power.</COL>

MsgJp:
打属性攻撃によって
受けるダメージ量が軽減される
<COL ffdc78>LV毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
MsgEn:
The damage received from striking attacks is
reduced.
<COL ffdc78>Damage further reduced per lvl</COL>

MsgJp:
弓の移動射ちの際、矢が照準からぶれなくなる
<COL ffdc78>LV毎にぶれ幅がさらに軽減</COL>
MsgEn:
Keeps your arrows from flying off mark when you
loose them whilst in motion.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases
deviation.</COL>

MsgJp:
一度に矢筒に補充できる矢の本数が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に矢の装填数がより増加</COL>
MsgEn:
Increases the number of arrows that can be loaded
into the quiver at a time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases arrow count
further.</COL>

MsgJp:
達人装填の成功時にスタミナが回復する
<COL ffdc78>LV毎にスタミナ回復量がより増加</COL>
MsgEn:
Recover Stamina when performing a master reload.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases recovered Stamina
further.</COL>

MsgJp:
状態異常を引き起こす矢の威力が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に状態異常値がより増加</COL>
MsgEn:
Increases the effectiveness of status
effect-inducing arrows.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases status
effectiveness.</COL>

MsgJp:
達人装填のジャストタイミングの受付時間が
延長されより成功率が上昇する
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に受付時間がより延長</COL>
MsgEn:
Extends the time window for a master reload,
making it easier to perform.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends time window
further.</COL>

MsgJp:
吹き飛ばし力が上昇し、
敵の体勢を崩しやすくなる
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に吹き飛ばし力がより増加</COL>
MsgEn:
Increases blow power, making it easier to stagger
enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases blow
power.</COL>

MsgJp:
射属性攻撃によって
受けるダメージ量が軽減される
<COL ffdc78>LV毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
MsgEn:
Reduces the damage you take from missile attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces chance of
being staggered.</COL>

MsgJp:
ヒールオーラ、セイントオーラ展開時の
スタミナ消費量が軽減される
<COL ffdc78>LV毎にスタミナ消費がさらに減少</COL>
MsgEn:
Decreases Stamina consumption while channeling
Heal Aura and Holy Aura.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption
further.</COL>

MsgJp:
フィールドシフト時に
敵の注目を集めにくくする
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に敵からの注目度がさらに減少</COL>
MsgEn:
Decreases the attention of enemies while using
Field Shift.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases attention
further.</COL>

MsgJp:
ヒールオーラ展開時に
敵から注目されにくくなる
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に敵からの注目度がさらに減少</COL>
MsgEn:
Reduces threat generation from deploying Heal
Aura.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces threat
generation.</COL>

MsgJp:
表出させたシークレットコア出現時間が
延長される
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に出現時間がより延長</COL>
MsgEn:
Increases the duration of secret cores.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increses
duration.</COL>

MsgJp:
助け起こしたパーティーメンバーの
最大体力が一定時間増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
MsgEn:
Temporarily increases the maximum health of
allies you revive.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases effect
duration.</COL>

MsgJp:
受けるダメージ量が軽減される
<COL ffdc78>LV毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
MsgEn:
Reduces damage taken.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces damage
taken.</COL>

MsgJp:
アトラクト発動時に
より敵の注目を集めるようになる
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に敵からの注目度がより増加</COL>
MsgEn:
Increases the rate at which Attract
generates enemy attention.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases
attention.</COL>

MsgJp:
フォースバーストで
より敵を状態異常にかかりやすくする
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に状態異常値がより増加</COL>
MsgEn:
Increases the rate at which Force Burst
applies elemental debilitations.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases debilitation rate
further.</COL>

MsgJp:
フォースエンチャントほか、エンチャント系
スキルの効果持続時間が延長される
<COL ffdc78>LV毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
MsgEn:
Increases the effect duration
of Force Enchantment.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration
further.</COL>

MsgJp:
シールドシーケンスを行ったときに
スタミナが回復する

MsgJp:
押収した小型のナイフ
刃が鈍いため殺傷能力は低いと思われる
柄に文字が刻んであり、B-A-S-I-Tと読める
MsgEn:
Seized small knife.
The blade appears to be dull, so its killing
power is likely low.
The handle has the characters engraved, and it
can be read as B-A-S-I-T.

MsgJp:
メガドのゴロツキリーダーが
自警のため自主的に作成した市民名簿
一般市民だけでなく、闇に生きる
はみ出し者たちまでが網羅されている
本人の超記憶能力と照らし合わせているため
正確性は高いらしい
MsgEn:
Megado's Thug Leader created a citizen register
voluntarily for self-defense.
Not only regular citizens, but also those who
live in the dark, including outcasts, are
included.
Due to their extraordinary memory abilities, the
accuracy of the register is said to be high.

MsgJp:
メガドを縄張りにする子供から聞いた目撃証言
“ <NPC 691>は数度にわたって彼らの縄張りに
　踏み込み、覚者たちを尾行するための
　事前調査を行っていた ”
という旨の内容
MsgEn:
Approximate eyewitness testimony from a child in
the Megado's territory:
"<NPC 691> trespassed into their territory
several times, conducting preliminary
investigations to tail the Arisen Corps members."

MsgJp:
汚い字でメモが書き込んである
“ ＜20時　対象を確認＞
　　場所：メガド居住区侯爵邸前
　　人数：2名
　　報告：ターゲットがレジスタンスと接触
　　　　　隠れ家へ向かうと思われるため
　　　　　引き続き、追跡監視の任務続行 ”
以下、同じような記録が淡々と続いている
MsgEn:
The memo is written in messy handwriting.
"<20:00 Target Confirmation>
Location: In front of the Megado Residential
District Marquis Mansion
Number of People: 2
Report: Target has made contact with the
Resistance and is believed to be heading towards
their hideout. The mission of tracking and
surveillance will continue."
Similar records continue in a matter-of-fact
manner.

MsgJp:
憲兵が落とした日々の巡回記録
複数の憲兵により異なる筆跡で書かれているが
どれも書式は共通している
“ ＜22時　対象を確認＞
　　場所：メガド居住区東小門前
　　人数：5名
　　報告：通報のあった結社集会の現場を発見
　　　　　構成員は全て市民のため
　　　　　その場で拘束・連行し、任務完了 ”
以下、同じような記録が淡々と続いている
MsgEn:
Daily Patrol Records Dropped by the Military
Police.
Written in different handwriting by multiple
military policemen,
but all the formats are the same.
"<22:00 Confirm target>
Location: Megado Residential Area, East Gate
Number of people: 5
Report: Discovered the site of a reported
association gathering
All members are citizens
Arrested and taken into custody on the spot,
mission complete"
Following that, similar records continue in a
steady manner.

MsgJp:
元憲兵の男が、獄中で書いた手記
“ 任務で小さなミスを犯し、侯爵の怒りを
　買ったために投獄された ”
という内容で、獄中の苦しい状況などが
克明に描写されている
ところどころがシミで汚れており読みづらい
MsgEn:
Memoirs Written by a Former Military Police
Officer in Prison
The handwritten memoirs of a former military
police officer, who was imprisoned after
committing a minor mistake on a mission and
incurring the wrath of a nobleman.
The memoirs vividly depict the harsh conditions
experienced in prison, although some parts are
difficult to read due to stains.

MsgJp:
連絡が途絶えた一人息子を想う父の
愛情が詰まった手作りのお守り
息子を憲兵隊に送り出す際に
渡し損ねたことを悔やむ日々が
傷だらけの表面に現れている
MsgEn:
A handmade amulet filled with a father's love,
yearning for his son who he lost contact with. The
days of regret for not being able to hand it over
when sending his son off to the Military Police
are evident on its scarred surface.

MsgJp:
<NPC 586>と密通していたオークが
持っていた文書
オークの暗号文字で書かれており
読むことはできない
MsgEn:
The document was in the possession of an Orc who
was in secret communication with <NPC 586>.
It is written in Orc code letters and cannot be
read.

MsgJp:
オークの専門家が人語に翻訳してくれた
オーク軍の密通文書
“ オーク軍は要請に応え、
　メガドに援軍を手配した ”
という旨の内容
MsgEn:
The Orc specialist has translated the
confidential communication documents of the Orc
army into human language.
"Orc Forces responded to the request and arranged
for reinforcements to be sent to Megado."

MsgJp:
オークの被害を受けた少女から聞いた
街に増加するオークについての目撃証言
“ 近頃急速に街中で目撃数が増加している
　オークたちは何かを探している様子
　人なのか物なのか、任務なのかは不明 ”
という旨の内容で、出没し始めた時期は
<NPC 586>の死亡・オークの尋問開始と
重なっている模様
MsgEn:
From a girl who was affected by the Orcs'
rampage, an eyewitness account about the
increasing number of sightings of Orcs in the
city.
"The number of sightings in the city has been
rapidly increasing lately. The Orcs seem to be
looking for something. Whether it's a person or an
object, or if it's a mission, is unknown."
It seems that their appearance coincides with the
death of <NPC 586> and the start of Orc
interrogations.

MsgJp:
<NPC 681>侯爵が描かれた肖像画
高価な貴族画ではなく
個人が安価に所有できる量産品である
雑な取扱いによる傷みはあるが、
顔かたちは十分に確認できる状態
MsgEn:
Portrait depicting <NPC 681>, a marquis.
Not an expensive aristocratic painting, but a
mass-produced item that individuals can afford.
There may be some damage due to rough handling,
but the facial features are clearly discernible.

MsgJp:
ある兵士から聞いた、メガド占領時に
<NPC 681>が行った英雄的行為の証言
“ ナヴィド侯爵は死の危険を冒し、果敢にも
  人間への残虐な仕打ちを止めるよう
  オーク軍と交渉した
  その後も市民の統率者として、オーク側との
  橋渡しを行い、犠牲者を抑える功績を残す ”
という旨の内容
MsgEn:
Testimony of the heroic deeds performed by <NPC
681> during the Megado occupation, as told by a
soldier:
"Lord Navido bravely risked his life and daringly
negotiated with the Orc army to put an end to
their cruel treatment of humans. Even after that,
as a leader of the citizens, he acted as a bridge
between the Orc side, leaving behind the
achievement of minimizing casualties."

MsgJp:
侯爵家を出入りしていた戦士が
偶然入手した謎の帳簿
かなり使い込まれているようで
几帳面な字で文字と数字が羅列されている
“オーク”という言葉が頻出している
MsgEn:
A soldier who frequented the Marquis' household
happened to come across a mysterious ledger.
It appears to have been heavily used, with neat
handwriting and a series of characters and numbers
listed.
The word "Orc" is frequently mentioned.

MsgJp:
捕えたオークから尋問によって全てを吐かせた
<NPC 681>とオーク軍の機密についての証言
“ メガド陥落は、悲観した<NPC 681>侯爵の
  手引きによって引き起こされた事件であり
  陥落後も彼はオーク軍と取引し
  捕虜の統括に対する報酬を受け取っていた ”
という旨の内容となっている
MsgEn:
The capture of <NPC 681> and interrogation of the
orc revealed the following confidential
information:
'Megado's fall was an event instigated through
the guidance of the despairing Marquis <NPC 681>.
Even after the fall, he continued to deal with the
Orc army and received rewards for overseeing the
prisoners.'

MsgJp:
監修ガクシャ・制作セリンで捏造した
オーク軍の手配書
“ 人間に寝返った伝令兵を捜索中 ”
という旨の内容になっており
尋問で使用すれば
裏切りに対する報復を恐れるオークを
騙すことが出来るかもしれない
MsgEn:
A fabricated wanted poster created by Supervisor
Raksha and produced by Serine,
"Searching for a defected messenger soldier"
It contains a message that may deceive the Orcs,
who fear retaliation for their betrayal, when used
for interrogation.
